verses.verse: All the Mitzvot <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117> shall ye observe <WH8104> <WH8799> to do <WH6213> <WH8800>, that ye may live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8804>, and go in <WH935> <WH8804> and possess <WH3423> <WH8804> the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto your fathers <WH1>.

And thou shalt remember <WH2142> <WH8804> all the way <WH1870> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> led <WH3212> <WH8689> thee these forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness <WH4057>, to humble <WH6031> <WH8763> thee, and to prove <WH5254> <WH8763> thee, to know <WH3045> <WH8800> what was in thine heart <WH3824>, whether thou wouldest keep <WH8104> <WH8799> his Mitzvot <WH4687>, or no.

And he humbled <WH6031> <WH8762> thee, and suffered thee to hunger <WH7456> <WH8686>, and fed <WH398> <WH8686> thee with manna <WH4478>, which thou knewest <WH3045> <WH8804> not, neither did thy fathers <WH1> know <WH3045> <WH8804>; that he might make thee know <WH3045> <WH8687> that man <WH120> doth not live <WH2421> <WH8799> by bread <WH3899> only <WH905>, but by every word that proceedeth <WH4161> out of the mouth <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> doth man <WH120> live <WH2421> <WH8799>.
Thy raiment <WH8071> waxed not old <WH1086> <WH8804> upon thee, neither did thy foot <WH7272> swell <WH1216> <WH8804>, these forty <WH705> years <WH8141>.

Thou shalt also consider <WH3045> <WH8804> in <WH5973> thine heart <WH3824>, that, as a man <WH376> chasteneth <WH3256> <WH8762> his son <WH1121>, so the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> chasteneth <WH3256> <WH8764> thee.
Therefore thou shalt keep <WH8104> <WH8804> the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in his ways <WH1870>, and to fear <WH3372> <WH8800> him.

For the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> bringeth <WH935> <WH8688> thee into a good <WH2896> land <WH776>, a land <WH776> of brooks <WH5158> of water <WH4325>, of fountains <WH5869> and depths <WH8415> that spring out <WH3318> <WH8802> of valleys <WH1237> and hills <WH2022>;
A land <WH776> of wheat <WH2406>, and barley <WH8184>, and vines <WH1612>, and fig trees <WH8384>, and pomegranates <WH7416>; a land <WH776> of oil <WH8081> olive <WH2132>, and honey <WH1706>;

A land <WH776> wherein <WH834> thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> without <WH3808> scarceness <WH4544>, thou shalt not lack <WH2637> <WH8799> any thing in it; a land <WH776> whose stones <WH68> are iron <WH1270>, and out of whose hills <WH2042> thou mayest dig <WH2672> <WH8799> brass <WH5178>.

When thou hast eaten <WH398> <WH8804> and art full <WH7646> <WH8804>, then thou shalt bless <WH1288> <WH8765> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> for the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which he hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> thee.

Beware <WH8104> <WH8734> that thou forget <WH7911> <WH8799> not the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, in not keeping <WH8104> <WH8800> his Mitzvot <WH4687>, and his judgments <WH4941>, and his statutes <WH2708>, which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>:
Lest when thou hast eaten <WH398> <WH8799> and art full <WH7646> <WH8804>, and hast built <WH1129> <WH8799> goodly <WH2896> houses <WH1004>, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> therein;

And when thy herds <WH1241> and thy flocks <WH6629> multiply <WH7235> <WH8799>, and thy silver <WH3701> and thy gold <WH2091> is multiplied <WH7235> <WH8799>, and all that thou hast is multiplied <WH7235> <WH8799>;

Then thine heart <WH3824> be lifted up <WH7311> <WH8804>, and thou forget <WH7911> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, which brought thee forth <WH3318> <WH8688> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>;

Who led <WH3212> <WH8688> thee through that great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> wilderness <WH4057>, wherein were fiery <WH8314> serpents <WH5175>, and scorpions <WH6137>, and drought <WH6774>, where there was no water <WH4325>; who brought thee forth <WH3318> <WH8688> water <WH4325> out of the rock <WH6697> of flint <WH2496>;

Who fed <WH398> <WH8688> thee in the wilderness <WH4057> with manna <WH4478>, which thy fathers <WH1> knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not, that he might humble <WH6031> <WH8763> thee, and that he might prove <WH5254> <WH8763> thee, to do thee good <WH3190> <WH8687> at thy latter end <WH319>;
And thou say <WH559> <WH8804> in thine heart <WH3824>, My power <WH3581> and the might <WH6108> of mine hand <WH3027> hath gotten <WH6213> <WH8804> me this wealth <WH2428>.

But thou shalt remember <WH2142> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>: for it is he that giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee power <WH3581> to get <WH6213> <WH8800> wealth <WH2428>, that he may establish <WH6965> <WH8687> his covenant <WH1285> which he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thy fathers <WH1>, as it is this day <WH3117>.

And it shall be, if thou do at all <WH7911> <WH8800> forget <WH7911> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and walk <WH1980> <WH8804> after <WH310> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8804> them, and worship <WH7812> <WH8694> them, I testify <WH5749> <WH8689> against you this day <WH3117> that ye shall surely <WH6> <WH8800> perish <WH6> <WH8799>.

As the nations <WH1471> which the YY <WH3068> destroyeth <WH6> <WH8688> before your face <WH6440>, so shall ye perish <WH6> <WH8799>; because <WH6118> ye would not be `Ovedient <WH8085> <WH8799> unto the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.
